note.p: Birth: Burcombe, near Bodmin, Cornwall, England (14 February 1775)
Death: Stanhope Cottage, Hampstead Road, London (20 June 1849)
Career: Apprenticed to John Hunter (FRS 1767) (1792); engaged by Hunter's executors to care for Hunterian collection (1793); Curator, Hunterian Museum
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1849 No 74 pp 876-880
References: Sir Harold Hartley, 'Richard Owen and William Clift' in NR 1953 vol 10 pp 60-62
N G Coley, 'The Animal Chemistry Club; Assistant Society to the Royal Society' in NR 1967 vol 22 pp 173-185
